name: Moe Escape
summary:
You wake up from a state of unconsciousness in a nearly pitch black room. You can hear the voice of a young girl asking if you're okay. You soon realize you are chained to a wall and the only way to escape is to give orders to the little girl who is trapped with you.

Use your powers of observation and puzzle solving to escape from the room to safety.
